instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message:
Hi, yesterday my client computer was working. Today it stopped working, and no power is coming on. 

Where should I start troubleshoot the problem?

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message: History??? Water damage?? Have you opened the machine?? Original charger??

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 35962"]History??? Water damage?? Have you opened the machine?? Original charger??[/QUOTE]

Original charger yes, No water damage, ive open the machine, but dont know here to start troubleshoot?

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message: Where are you located? If the machine is <2 years old and you are in the EU take it to Apple.

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 35976"]Where are you located? If the machine is <2 years old and you are in the EU take it to Apple. [/QUOTE]

Im in Sweden Duke. Ok, will speak to customer and ask him how long he had it.. Do u have any other suggestion what it could be?

threads.title: Macbook A1708 wont start
threads.message: It could be anything at this point. Please take this thing to Apple as EU law requires them to give a 2 year warranty if you have the original invoice.
